price: A jẹ́pè rẹ̀. A sì gbà á là nínú ìbànújẹ́. Báyẹn ni A ṣe ń gba àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo là.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajabnā lahu wanajjaynāhu mina al-ghami wakadhālika nunjī al-mu'minīna
